entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @realDonaldTrump Right now no one believes were are ahead of the coronavirus curve... no one believes it’s contained... all awaiting facts of a cure or facts that it’s not as dire as the Leftist Media and Leftist Democrats have pushed it, that it’s not more dire than flu... until then, panic.
